<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/rsync`**

**quick ref:**
> /rsync [-asset] [src]

**description:**

```
sync all files from source folder. 
-asset only sync remote asset manifest files from src. 
examples:
/rsync -asset D:\lxzsrc\ParaCraftSDKGit\build\ParacraftBuild\res
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
